mapper.select: select * from ws_sqqk t where t.sqxh = #{sqxh}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WS_SQQK(SQXH, SLLSH, JYLSH, ACCOUNTID, DJXH, NSRSBH, SWJG_DM, SWSX_DM, SXSHFS_DM, BLZT_DM, LRSJ) VALUES ( #{sqxh, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sllsh, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{jylsh, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{djxh, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nsrsbh, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{swjgDm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{swsxDm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sxshfsDm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{blztDm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate )
